Choose what to display on the Vital Signs bar

1 Click the Real-Time Variables button .

Or, on the Template menu, click Real-Time Variables.

2 Click Next >> four times to go the Vital Signs Bar dialog box if necessary.

3 In the Chart Variables box, double-click a variable to add it to the list. You can include up to six variables on the Vital Signs bar.

4 To remove a variable from the list, click it in the box on the right, and then click <<.

5 To remove all variables from the list, click <<Remove All.

6 Use the Move arrows to change the position of the variable on the Vital Signs bar.

7 Under Bar Includes, click Fluid intake and output to display the fluid balance at the bottom of the bar.

8 Click Close.
